SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreMenus] ( [CoreMenus_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreMenus_Title] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreMenus_Order] int NULL , [CoreMenus_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreMenus_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreMenus_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreMenus_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreMenus_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreMenus_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreMenus] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreMenus PRIMARY KEY ([CoreMenus_Ky])
